summary.para: Gets the media keys object associated with the media engine or null if there is not a media keys object.

param.name: keys
param.para: The media keys object associated with the media engine or null if there is not a media keys object.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the media keys object to use with the media engine.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Implemented by the media engine to add encrypted media extensions methods.
